title: Aoi Usagi
lyrics: ... Atodore kurai setsunaku nareba | ... Anata no koe ga kikoeru .. kashira Nanigenai kotoba o |hitomi mawasete tadashizukani,| Kawaseru dakede ii |hokani wa nan ni mo iranai. .... Aoi usagi zutto matteru hitori kiride furue nagara Sabishi suggite shinde shimauwa hayaku atatamete hoshii
